SELECT
FROM mtmydb.mtmy_day_account a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users b ON a.rebate_user=b.user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users c ON a.receive_user=c.user_id WHERE a.id=#{id}

SELECT
FROM mtmydb.mtmy_day_account a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users b ON a.rebate_user=b.user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users c ON a.receive_user=c.user_id WHERE 1=1
AND b.nickname like '%'||#{rebateName} ||'%' CONCAT('%', #{rebateName} , '%')
AND c.nickname like '%'||#{receiveName} ||'%' CONCAT('%', #{receiveName} , '%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.rabate_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.rabate_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
